name: No Hearts For Liberty
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam 30 for the theme "Heartbeat"

Using Wildcards: See No Evil & Flattery

You have been granted an internship position as a field operator in the Organization of Free Nations, a transnational organization, leaded by United States and her allies, to bring liberty and freedom for people around the world. 

Your actions in the OFN will influence the outcome of the story.

This is a puzzle game.

Hint: Use the commands "help" to display a list of commands available 

Other Stuffs:

Source code: https://github.com/Xascoria/GodotWildJam

Inspirations: 

Lucas Pope's works

HOI4: TNO mod
